author: Ross Burden
method: Place the ingredients into a food processor and blend together to form a coarse paste. Spread the tapenade onto toasted ciabatta bread and serve.
ingredients: 3 garlic cloves, roughly chopped,  1 large handful black olives, pitted ,  handful fresh flatleaf parsley leaves ,  1 lemon, zest only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  freshly ground black pepper, to taste,  toasted ciabatta, to serve
